arg1: ^/%arjuna_normal/ I have not stolen the dog's necktie.
arg1_1: ^/%noir_normal/ Can you prove you didn't do it?
arg1_3: ^/%arjuna_normal/ Last time I checked, there was no evidence against me, was there?
arg1_4: ^/%arjuna_normal/ But rest assured - I’ll soon provide you solid reasoning that will clear up this misunderstanding.
arg2: ^/%arjuna_angry/ The spirits would never forgive me for such an immoral act, and I’d surely be met /%arjuna_smug/ with <color=green>karmic punishment</color> /%arjuna_normal/ were I to do so!

c: ^/%noir_normal/ Would the spirits really be unwilling to forgive you, the Spiritualist Prodigy? I find that unlikely.
^/%arjuna_normal/ Why, you give me more credit than I’m due, Miss Noir.
^/%arjuna_normal/ I merely communicate with the spirits - they’re my friends, to put it simply.
^/%noir_normal/ “If I had friends, I guess I could answer that….”

arg3: ^/%arjuna_smug/ Not that I’d do it if that wasn’t the case, of course.

c: ^/%noir_normal/ “Oh? Are you really that good of a person?”
^/%arjuna_normal/ Of course I am! Do you think the spirits would lend their guidance to a man of evil thoughts?
^/%arjuna_normal/ Besides, am I not supposed to be innocent until proven otherwise? I’d expect you to give you a little more credit here!
^/%arjuna_normal/ But never fear! I will soon guide you to the truth you seek for!

arg4: ^After all, I wasn’t even aware that the dog wore a necktie!

c: ^/%arjuna_normal/ Yes, that would be the case.
^/%arjuna_normal/ Due to Miss Doggo’s… unique personality, I don’t usually exchange words with her.
^/%arjuna_normal/ As such, I’m not often in her dog’s presence - I never realized he wore a necktie.
^/%noir_normal/ “Even I had realized he wore a necktie…. Is Kumar really this distracted, or…?”

end_cycle: ^/%noir_normal/ “As it stands, I can see no fault in his testimony…. But if he is lying, his memories should betray his testimony at some point….”
mem_1: ^How do you fare today, oh mighty keeper of the afterworldly gates?
^I see that today, as usual, you carry the white flag that guides those who are lost, don’t you?
^Lulu, what are you doing? Leave this man’s presence at once!
^It’s fine, noble keeper. May your path be filled with the graces of Buddha.
wrong_contrad: ^/%arjuna_smug/ Shut the fuck up and let me finish.

arjuna_cross_exam_3: ^DAMN SON, WHERE'D YOU FIND THIS? (só tem isso)
